p:
The contribution from the environment R env 0 was
2.1
where σ is the duration of the latent period, ε is the rate at which birds are sold, γ is the duration of the infectious period, ω is the rate at which infectious birds shed virions, N is the number of birds in the market, η is the rate of virion decay in the environment, ψ is a restricted half-saturation constant for environmental transmission, and β env is the transmission rate from the environment to birds.
